document_data.name: Pharos
document_data.mainbody:
'''Pharos''' was the most powerful [[elven high mage]] among the [[Elf|elves]] of [[Forest of Tethir|Tethir]], [[Darthiir Wood]], and [[Shilmista]] and the one who trapped the [[genie]]s [[Calim]] and [[Memnon (efreeti)|Memnon]] in the ''[[Calimemnon Crystal]]'' and ended the [[First Era of Skyfire]]. He became a [[baelnorn]] and guarded over the ''Crystal'' for nearly 9,000 years.

As of [[1374 DR]], Pharos still resided in the [[Spinning Keep of Siri'wadjen]]. He cast [[illusion]]s and set traps throughout the Keep to prevent anyone from ever finding the ''Crystal''.
